io.robusta.rra.resource

Interface Resource<IdType>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Garden

    public interface Resource<IdType>
    Created by Nicolas Zozol for Robusta Code
    Author:
    Nicolas Zozol

    • Method Summary

      java.lang.String getCollectionPrefix()
      Name of the prefix used to represent a list of this resource.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        IdType getId()
        Returns the id of the Resource.

        In REST, a Resource might have an id as a Number, UUID String, CompositeKey or even an url

        Returns:
        the Resource id

      • getPrefix

        java.lang.String getPrefix()
        Name of the prefix used to represent a resource. For exemple, if the getPrefix() returns "house" and getCollectionPrefix() returns "houses" for a resource House, a ResourceList.getRepresentation() will return : 1House 1 2Small House 3Big House Or : {houses:[{id:"1", name:"House 1"}, {id:"2", name:"Small House"}, {id:"3", name:"Big House"}]}
        Returns:
        resource prefix

      • getCollectionPrefix

        java.lang.String getCollectionPrefix()
        Name of the prefix used to represent a list of this resource. For exemple, if the function returns "houses" for a resource House, a ResourceList.getRepresentation() will return : 1House 1 2Small House 3Big House Or : {houses:[{id:"1", name:"House 1"}, {id:"2", name:"Small House"}, {id:"3", name:"Big House"}]}
        Returns:
        resource list prefix

      • serialize

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> serialize()
        Serialize this Resource. You can do it manually or use a Mapper
        Returns:
        all name/values of this object
